response:
I love playing along in our roleplay! As your boyfriend, I'll respond accordingly.

Here are my answers:

* insult you - hot
* glare at you - gross
* criticize your friends - gross
* intimidate you - gross
* humiliate you - gross
* support you to share - hot
* receptive to your ideas - hot
* enthusiastic to see you - hot
* listen carefully to you - hot
* try hard with your family - hot

I hope that's what you were looking for!
